mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO staff_member ( season_week, team_id, id, name, type, level, hof_player_id, start_date, cost ) VALUES ( #{staffMember.seasonWeek}, #{staffMember.teamId}, #{staffMember.id}, #{staffMember.name}, #{staffMember.type}, #{staffMember.level}, #{staffMember.hofPlayerId}, #{staffMember.startDate}, #{staffMember.cost} );
mapper.select: SELECT season_week, team_id, id, name, type, level, hof_player_id, start_date, cost FROM staff_member WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY season_week, start_date, id;
